definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)
measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male

sentences.english: My aunt and uncle were here last night to check out the new TV.
sentences.chinese: 我姑媽和姑丈昨晚到這來查看這臺新的電視。

definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
older male cousin via female line
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
